pr_title: NIFI-6791 Add UUID3 and UUID5 functions to Expression Language

timeline.message:
NIFI-6791 Add UUID3 and UUID5 functions to Expression Language

timeline.bodyText: I think this is throwing a NullRef when the attribute referenced doesn't exist
timeline.author: shayneburgess

replies.bodyText: Fixed. Returns new StringQueryResult(null) now if the subject is null.
replies.author: jfrazee
